Got this one in a lightening deal @ ₹25 only... :)
BySteve Rogers..TOP 500 REVIEWERon 18 January 2017
Verified Purchase
You wont believe me if I told you that I had got this game on 1st october 2016 in lightening deal at only ₹ 25... Seriously nobody would dare to believe that.
Its MRP Is 999, and I got it at only ₹ 25...
The gaming graphics is very good. This is a 100% original disc. The prouct key is mentioned inside the box and you have to activate the game by using online stream account..
After installing the game you will get a pop up message that you need to download additional 5.3 gb to update the game. But dont need to worry about it will actually download near about 300 to 550 mb..
After installing the game you can play the online mode and also you will able to play the game in offline mode also...
Gaming graphics is good and gameplay is also good.
Thank you..

5.0 out of 5 stars
If you like crashing cars
ByToaston 12 March 2017
Verified Purchase
This game is no longer available for purchase on Steam but the retail key included with the DVD still activates the game on Steam. It was previously available for free from HumbleBundle sometime in Jan 2017 and it had its last sale on 25th Feb 2017 at 90% off for Rs. 47. It was then removed due to some licensing issue.
I got it here after its removal for Rs. 99, double the discounted price but you only have to download ~200MB after installing from the DVD. I also don't see any region restriction on playing the game from outside India during travel.
